description: UMD 3.14.6 is a revision update of the third Major release of UMD. In particular, it contains an update for lcmaps-plugins-vo-ca-ap.
releaseNotes: This release contains the following products: lcmaps-plugins-vo-ca-ap for SL6.
installationNotes: All products in UMD 3.14.6 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the UMD, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: cto (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this UMD release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.
knownIssues: Please visit https://wiki.egi.eu/wiki/UMD-3:UMD-3.14.6 for known issues.
changeLog: This release includes lcmaps-plugins-vo-ca-ap, needed for supporting the IGTF IOTA profile of CAs.

products.name: lcmaps-plugins-vo-ca-ap.lcmaps-plugins-vo-ca-ap
products.description: It provides the functionality for making authorization decisions based on the combination of (type of) CA and VO. This is needed for supporting the IGTF IOTA profile of CAs: due to the lower Level-of-Assurance (LoA), those CAs are only allowed in combination with higher LoA VOs.
